ca.mcgill.ecse211.project

Class ObjectDetection

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.ObjectDetection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ObjectDetection
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Class to implement search and obstacle avoidance. The searchVehicle method starts the search process. It takes in the search zone boundary parameters and generates a set of waypoints to travel to. It calls the moveToWaypoint method to move to a specific way point and also checks if there are any objects in its path. If any object is detected, it is checked if it is an obstacle or a vehicle. In case of an obstacle, the avoidObstacle method is called to avoid the obstacle. In case of the vehicle, the towVehicle method is called to attach the vehicle to the claw.
    Author:
    Mustafain

    • Method Detail

      • searchVehicle

        public void searchVehicle(double SZ_LL_X,
                          double SZ_LL_Y,
                          double SZ_UR_X,
                          double SZ_UR_Y)
        This method starts the vehicle search process. It takes in the search zone boundary parameters and generates a set of way points to travel to. It calls the moveToWaypoint method to move to a specific way point and also checks if there are any objects in its path. If any object is detected, it is checked if it is an obstacle or a vehicle. In case of an obstacle, the avoidObstacle method is called to avoid the obstacle. In case of the vehicle, the towVehicle method is called to attach the vehicle to the claw.
        Parameters:
        SZ_LL_X - the lower left x coordinate of the assigned search zone
        SZ_LL_Y - the lower left y coordinate of the assigned search zone
        SZ_UR_X - the upper right x coordinate of the assigned search zone
        SZ_UR_Y - the upper right y coordinate of the assigned search zone

      • run

        public void run()
        This thread runs the vehicle search algorithm. It is the thread used for navigating in a grid. It does so by visiting each tile one by one through the center. This thread is interrupted by the detectObject thread when an object is detected.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • avoidObstacle

        public void avoidObstacle()
        This method is called when an obstacle is detected. It avoids the obstacle by moving around the obstacle from the left or right directions depending on the current position of the robot and the search zone (SZ) boundary.

      • moveToWaypoint

        public void moveToWaypoint(double x,
                           double y)
        Moves the robot to the specified waypoint.
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate of waypoint to travel to
        y - y-coordinate of waypoint to travel to

      • towVehicle

        public void towVehicle()
        This method is called when a vehicle is detected, this method orients the claw to be in line with the axle. The RobotClaw class is then used to attach the vehicle to the robot.
